name.japanese: パンクハザード研究所

description: Caesar Clown's research facility on Punk Hazard, consisting of multiple buildings connected by passages. The laboratory is where Caesar conducts his illegal experiments and weapons development.

keyEvents.title: Straw Hats Break Into Laboratory
keyEvents.description: The protagonists breach the laboratory wall to escape the Shinokuni gas, creating a hole that ironically allows the gas to enter.
keyEvents.significance: The laboratory becomes the main setting for the escape and confrontation sequences.

keyEvents.title: G-5 Marines Seal the Breach
keyEvents.description: The G-5 Marines work to seal the hole in the laboratory to prevent gas infiltration.
keyEvents.significance: Shows the facility's vulnerability to the deadly gas outside.

description: A section of the Punk Hazard laboratory that contains the R-66 passage, a transport tunnel that leads directly to the sea. This building serves as the escape route from Caesar's facility.

keyEvents.title: Law Reveals Building R as Escape Route
keyEvents.description: Law directs everyone to find the door marked 'R Building 66' as their only safe escape from the facility.
keyEvents.significance: Establishes Building R as the critical objective for all protagonists.

keyEvents.title: Caesar Orders Passage to Building R Sealed
keyEvents.description: Caesar attempts to prevent the protagonists from reaching Building R by sealing the passage and releasing gas.
keyEvents.significance: Creates the major obstacle and urgency for reaching the escape route.
